DOC.criteria: Require Orthodontic Treatment Have permanent dentition No craniofacial anomaly present No past present sign symptoms periodontal disease No significant medical history medication would adversely affect development structure teeth jaws subsequent tooth movement No previous orthodontic orthopaedic relapse No history trauma , bruxism parafunction 16 46 year old , inclusive No skeletal jaw discrepancy Angle Class I Class II molar canine relationship Crowding least 4mm per arch No osteoporosis drug Subjects fulfill inclusion criterion requirement
